mapper.select: select count(*) totalCnt, sum(aptdaCnt) aptCnt from apt join aptinfo using(aptcode) where left(dongcode, 2) = #{sido}
select count(*) totalCnt, sum(aptdaCnt) aptCnt from apt join aptinfo using(aptcode) where left(dongcode, 5) = #{gugun}
select count(*) totalCnt, sum(aptdaCnt) aptCnt from apt join aptinfo using(aptcode) where left(dongcode, 8) = #{dong}

select aptCode, aptName, sidoName, gugunName, dongName, leeName, dongCode, aptAddr, codeSaleNm, codeHeatNm, aptTarea, aptDongCnt, aptdaCnt, aptTel, aptFax, aptUrl, codeAptNm, doroJuso, hoCnt, codeMgrNm, codeHallNm, aptUsedate, aptMarea, aptMparea_60, aptMparea_85, aptMparea_135, aptMparea_136, privArea, codeGarbage, aptdEcnt, aptdPcnt, aptdPcntu, codeNet, aptdCccnt, welfareFacility, aptdWtimebus, subwayLine, subwayStation, aptdWtimesub, convenientFacility, educationFacility from apt join aptinfo using(aptCode) join aptdetail using(aptCode) where dongCode = #{dong} order by aptName

select aptCode, aptName, sidoName, gugunName, dongName, leeName, dongCode, aptAddr, codeSaleNm, codeHeatNm, aptTarea, aptDongCnt, aptdaCnt, aptTel, aptFax, aptUrl, codeAptNm, doroJuso, hoCnt, codeMgrNm, codeHallNm, aptUsedate, aptMarea, aptMparea_60, aptMparea_85, aptMparea_135, aptMparea_136, privArea, codeGarbage, aptdEcnt, aptdPcnt, aptdPcntu, codeNet, aptdCccnt, welfareFacility, aptdWtimebus, subwayLine, subwayStation, aptdWtimesub, convenientFacility, educationFacility from apt join aptinfo using(aptCode) join aptdetail using(aptCode) order by aptName

select left(dongCode, 2) code, sidoName name, round(avg(dealAmount/dealArea)) areaAvg, round(avg(dealAmount)) amtAvg from aptdeal a join sidocode s on left(dongCode, 2) = s.sidoCode group by left(dongCode, 2) order by code

select left(dongCode, 5) code, gugunName name, round(avg(dealAmount/dealArea)) areaAvg, round(avg(dealAmount)) amtAvg from aptdeal a join guguncode s on left(dongCode, 5) = s.gugunCode group by left(dongCode, 5) having left(code, 2) = #{sido} order by code

select left(a.dongCode, 8) code, dongName name, round(avg(dealAmount/dealArea)) areaAvg, round(avg(dealAmount)) amtAvg from aptdeal a join dongcode d on left(a.dongCode, 8) = left(d.dongCode, 8) group by left(d.dongCode, 8) having left(code, 5) = #{gugun} order by code
